text_content: $HYPE   This setup is purely if then and entirely dependent on how price structure develops from here.  At the moment, there‚Äôs no bias being forced. The market needs to show its hand first. Until structure confirms, it‚Äôs simply an area of interest rather than an active trade.  The Monday high and the yearly open are key reference levels. If price reaches these levels and manages to flip them into support with clear structural continuation, they can just as easily become a valid point of interest for a long setup.  In other words, the level itself isn‚Äôt bullish or bearish on its own. The reaction and follow-through are what matter. If the flip holds and continuation follows, the long thesis becomes valid. If not, it‚Äôs just another level to respect and move on from. #BNBChain#  #BTC Price Analysis#  #Altcoin Season#

HYPE: THE 37 MILLION TOKEN BURN

Hyperliquid validators have officially voted to recognize 37 million HYPE tokens in the Assistance Fund as permanently burned. 

This move represents a 13 percent reduction in total supply and introduces a permanent deflationary mechanic to the ecosystem. 

While the platform just hit a record 7 billion dollars in 24 hour perpetual volume, this supply crunch is designed to offset the inflationary pressure from recent team unlocks.

$HYPE  / USDT ‚Äî BULLISH STRUCTURE CONFIRMED  Price has just tapped the major support zone around 24.700 and immediately printed a strong 1H bullish confirmation candle, clearly showing that the level is being respected. This reaction suggests smart money absorption at support and continuation strength remains intact. As long as price holds above this zone, bullish continuation toward higher liquidity levels remains the higher-probability scenario.

Not every DeFi protocol is trying to replace centralized exchanges.  In a recent update, Hyperliquid‚Äôs founder made it clear that $HYPE  is focused on building alternative financial infrastructure, not benchmarking itself against CEX volumes or playing the ‚Äú #Binance  rival‚Äù game.  Tbh DeFi doesn‚Äôt need to outgun centralized platforms on raw liquidity to be valuable. Its edge is permissionless access, composability, and infra that works without custodians or gatekeepers.  This same mindset is showing up across the next wave of infra-focused networks like Haust.  Haust is approaching the problem from the user execution layer. Instead of chasing surface metrics, it‚Äôs building systems that reduce friction at the moment of action: intent-based transactions, account abstraction, native DEXs, and AI-driven execution through HAIA.  What‚Äôs important to understand here is that the philosophy remains the same. Build rails that do things centralized platforms can‚Äôt, rather than copying what they already do well.  That‚Äôs usually how real infrastructure wins over time.  #Altcoin Season#

$HYPE   was trading near $26.00 on Thursday, supported by improving market sentiment. The daily RSI is moving toward neutral and the MACD remains above its signal line, suggesting momentum is gradually improving and a test of the 50-day EMA at 28.22 is possible.  However, the broader trend remains cautious, as the 50-day, 100-day, and 200-day EMAs are still sloping lower. A clear close above these levels would be needed to confirm a sustained trend reversal. $HYPE  ‚Äôs derivatives market also showed positive signals, with futures open interest rising to 1.41 billion on Thursday from 1.3 billion the previous day.  The increase in open interest suggests renewed market participation and expectations of a short-term price move.  Track derivatives market data on #BingX.  #HYPE  #HyperLiquid  #Altcoin Season#

Staking activity on the $HYPE   network increased by nearly 6% on Thursday, pushing total value locked (TVL) to 1.37 billion. The rebound follows a recent pullback and suggests continued participation from long-term holders. A New Phase for DeFi Is Unfolding üìà  I‚Äôve been paying close attention to what‚Äôs happening on Polymarket, and right now there are two live prediction markets that stand out to me, one around $HYPE  and another around $ASTER .  For HYPE, the market is centered on where price could land by January, while ASTER has a longer horizon prediction focused on its valuation going into 2026.  What I like about this setup is that it reflects how these DEX tokens actually move, driven by usage, growth, and community strength, not just short term noise.  Instead of forcing a single trade idea, these markets let you position around probabilities, adjust as information changes, and exit when your edge shifts.  It feels less like traditional trading, and more like navigating evolving outcomes with better information.  Worth watching closely.  #Altcoin Season#

$HYPE /USDT ‚Äî LONG  Entry Zone: 24.750 ‚Äì 24.700 Stop Loss: 24.400 Take Profit: 25.550  Market has swept liquidity below the recent key support, clearing weak retail buyers, and is now closing back above the level with strong bullish momentum. This reclaim signals smart money support and short-term re-accumulation. As long as price holds above the reclaimed support, a continuation toward the 25.550 liquidity target is expected.  Trade with proper risk management.
